symbionts.settings.regenerateHelp: All temporary files will be deleted after page generation.
symbionts.settings.abbreviationsHelp: Language abbreviation will be written before page alias (example: /en/about/).
symbionts.settings.browserLanguageHelp: Content will be shown in browser's language, if the language is not specified.
symbionts.settings.aliasesInTranslitHelp: Page aliases will be converted to translit.
symbionts.settings.aliasesLanguage: The source language for conversion to the transliteration
